name: DS2672-ITP-S109 - EW and Drainage Material - Rev 1
template name: DS2672-ITP-S109 - EW and Drainage Material - Rev 1

name: Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - The laboratory shall be IANZ accredited for the specific testing required. The nominated Contractor shall submit details (including certificates, etc) of intended personnel and equipment for approval at least one week prior to the commencement of earthworks.
Frequency - One Week Prior to Earthworks
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Submit details (including certificates, etc) of intended personnel and equipment for approval at least one week prior to the commencement of earthworks.
Frequency - One week prior to the commencement of earthworks.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Nominated Contractor shall appoint an experienced full-time earthworks supervisor, whose duties shall include the control of filling operations in accordance with this specification.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Buttress fill shall be granular material obtained on-site either from undercut or from borrow areas.
Frequency - 1 set from the first lift, and 1 set per 500 m3 thereafter.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Buttress fill shall be tested for Heavy Compaction test (Proctor Test). Where appropriate, an oversize correction shall be applied to the target density derived from laboratory compaction tests.
Frequency - 2 sets at commencement of project.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - HDPE pipes shall be joined using the electro-fusion method. To ensure the full strength of the pipe is achieved and the connections are of a consistent quality, installers must be properly trained and certified.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - The HDPE Welder and power supply used for the fusion couplers shall be of a high quality and have the capability of readily fusing pipes of the specified diameter and wall thickness.
4.03.03 - Filter / Drainage F1, F2, F3 Weathering Resistance
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Zone F1, F2, F3 shall be tested for Weathering quality index
Frequency - 1 test for each material type
4.03.04 - Filter / Drainage Zone F1 Sieve Analysis
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Filter / drainage Zone F1 shall be tested for Sieve Analysis and fines testing
Verifying Document - IANZ PSD / Fines Test
Frequency - 1 pre-construction. 1 on initial placement. 2 further samples during placement.
4.03.05 - Filter / Drainage Zone F2 Sieve Analysis
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Filter / drainage Zone F2 shall be tested for Sieve Analysis and fines testing
Verifying Document - IANZ PSD / Fines Test
Frequency - 1 pre-construction. 1 on initial placement. 5 further samples during placement.
4.03.06 - Filter / Drainage Zone F3 Sieve Analysis
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Filter / drainage Zone F3 shall be tested for Sieve Analysis and fines testing
Verifying Document - IANZ PSD / Fines Test
Frequency - 1 pre-construction. 1 on initial placement. 3 further samples during placement.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Subsoil drain pipes shall be DN200 HDPE PN10 pipe. Five rows of 5mm holes shall be drilled at 75mm spacing along the length of the pipe, with the perforated portion of the pipe laid upwards.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Where shown on the drawings, all outlet pipes shall be DN630 HDPE PN12.5 pipe with standard dimension ratios as indicated.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Only hard, sound rock of uniform quality not subject to deterioration or breakdown will be acceptable. The rock shall be free of defined cleavage planes and should not be adversely affected by wetting and drying.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Rock riprap shall not be single sized but shall be a well graded mixture designed to ensure that all interstices between large rocks are filled with rock of progressively smaller size.
Verifying Document - On Site PSD / Investigation

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Rock should preferably be predominantly angular in shaped with not more than 25% of rocks, distributed through the gradation, having a length more than twice the breadth or thickness.
Verifying Document - On Site PSD / Investigation
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - River Diversion shall be Site Derived Granular Fill
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - River Diversion Bidim shall be A39 filter fabric.
